comment: This is the most boring guy ever.  You can't help but tune out after 10 minutes, even if you try to pay attention.  He writes super small and illegible on the board and talks at a low volume.  He doesn't explain things well, most of the class is just him scribbling down random equations without him telling you what they solve for.  Do not take.

I made a B. The class seemed easy to me at first. I did the homework and got Aâ€™s on the first 3 tests by studying the homework. The topics covered at the end of the course required integration, something I had forgotten or never had. I bombed the last test and the final but still got a B. Stephenson is dry but fair. Ask for an integration review.
